subject: Shooting (Sport)
Firearms
Laser (Light Amplification by Stimulated Emission of Radiation)
Pentathlon
lead_paragraph: Modern pentathlon’s governing body approved laser pistols for junior competitions, instead of pellet guns, starting in January, but stopped short of mandating their use for the 2012 Olympics.
snippet: Modern pentathlon’s governing body approved laser pistols for junior competitions, instead of pellet guns, starting in January, but stopped short of mandating their use for the 2012 Olympics.
